message.body: You need quickrete mortar mix not concrete mix for the wall

I have half a bag of mortar left and thats what i accidently used in the dining roam joists. Fortunately I didnt dig into the cement bags yet but now i know that mortar cantbecause it is the binding agent
Cant act alone. The cement has filler so its not the best glue. Thanks for the know-how.
Mortar is correct for packing around joist and filling between bricks and patching holes in bricks. Concrete is for pouring slabs or filling post holes
Good to know. I suppose my 2 bags 0f concrete mix outta help me stake claim on the dirt next door.
